abstract: Besides a mountain of statistics, Baseball-Reference.com artfully captures a player's history with cool circular icons that represent uniform icons.
snippet: Besides a mountain of statistics, Baseball-Reference.com artfully captures a player's history with cool circular icons that represent uniform icons.
lead_paragraph: If you have ever visited Baseball-Reference.com, you know that it is one of the greatest inventions of human history. Not only does the site contain every baseball statistic you could ever want, sorted in every imaginable way, but it also has cool circular icons that represent every team a player ever played for, and his uniform number on that team.
